front-door-max-results.label: Front Door Max Results
front-door-max-results.description: Maximum number of results to return from Front Door WAF log queries

front-door-memory-limit.label: Memory Limit
front-door-memory-limit.description: Memory limit for Front Door query processing (e.g., 1024M, 2G)

front-door-query-timeout.label: Query Timeout
front-door-query-timeout.description: Timeout in seconds for Front Door queries

front-door-default-bots-on.label: Default Bots Detection
front-door-default-bots-on.description: Enable bot detection by default in Front Door queries

front-door-default-enriching-on.label: Default Log Enrichment
front-door-default-enriching-on.description: Enable log enrichment by default in Front Door queries

front-door-default-unique-on.label: Default Unique Records
front-door-default-unique-on.description: Return only unique records by default in Front Door queries, this can significantly reduce the number of results.
